mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (name, member_id, pass, nickname, birth, gender, zipcode, address, address2, email, email_get, phone, member_reg_date ) VALUES (#{name}, #{memberId}, #{pass}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{email}, #{emailGet}, #{phone}, NOW())
mapper.update: Update Member SET member_type = 2, withdrawal_end_date = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Community WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY community_board_reg_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CommunityReply WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY community_reply_reg_date DESC
SELECT * FROM QnA WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY qna_board_reg_date DESC
SELECT * FROM QnAReply WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY qna_reply_reg_date DESC
